CareRequestExchangeInfo.name: CareRequestExchangeInfo
CareRequestExchangeInfo.description: Represents information about a care request exchange.

CareRequestId.description: The care request that the exchange details are captured for.

ExchangeMode.description: Specifies the mode of exchange. For example, X12 is the standard mode of exchange between an intermediary and a payer.

ExchangeTargetType.description: Specifies the target of the care request exchange.

ExchangeType.description: Specifies the type of care request exchange.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the record was last viewed.

RequestDateTime.description: The date and time when the request was sent or received.

ResponseDateTime.description: The date and time when the response to the request was sent or received.

ResponseStatusCode.description: The status code of the response.
